content: left-hand needle and > pick up 87 sts from front yoke and back yoke work r1 of nuki chart co5 using loop cast-on approximately pick up 2sts per 3rows pm for bor join to work in the round see page 6 > 92 sts total > 278 sts total r1-9 sm p1 k2 tbl p1 k to 3 sts bef m p1 k2 tbl r2-64 sm work the next row of nuki chart k2 tbl p1 k2 tbl 2 times r10 sm p1 k2 tbl p1 ssk k to 5 sts bef m k2to p1 k2 tbl > 2 more repeats of main pattern have been worked over the row > 2 sts decreased 90 sts total 4 repeats in total 4 / 10 r11-100 r1-10 9 times sec 9 neck > decrease 2 sts every 10 row > 18 sts decreased 72 sts total use 3 3mm/jp4 circular needle r101-109 sm p1 k2 tbl p1 k to 3 sts bef m p1 k2 tbl r110 sm p1 k2 tbl p1 ssk k10 ssk 2 times k13 setup place 46 neck sts held from sec 2 on the right-hand needle k2to k10 2 times k2to p1 k2 tbl join yarn pick up and knit 74 sts from the front neck > 6 sts decreased 66 sts total pm for bor join to work in the round > pick up 26 sts from left front edge sec 8 cuffs > pick up 22 sts from front yoke co > pick up 26 sts from right front edge change to 3 3mm/jp4 circular needle > 120 sts total r1 sm p1 k2 tbl p1 p to 3 sts bef m p1 k2 tbl work neck in the round r2 sm p1 k2 tbl p1 k to 3 sts bef m p1 k2 tbl r3-20 sm p1 k2 tbl to m r1 sm k to m r2 sm p to m change to 3 0mm/jp3 circular needle r3 sm k to m r4-9 sm p1 k2 tbl to m r21 sm k to m r10 sm k to m r22 sm p to m r11 sm p to m bobble all stitches knitwise bobble all stitches knitwise 5 / 10 chart legend nuki rs k ws p ー rs p ー ws k r rs m1r r ws m1pr l rs m1l l ws m1pl d rs mds d ws mds ∧ rs kds ∧ ws pds t turn co co using loop cast-on ／ 1/1 rt ＼ 1/1 lt main pattern 16 sts and 32 row in nuki chart when working in the round work all row on the right side 6 / 10 back shoulders 16 sts and 32 row in nuki chart see page 6 7 / 10 left front 8 / 10 right front 9 / 10 front yoke 10 / 10
